body.p: Laurel County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Basmath Peoples Bayless in Washington County, Tennessee, on November 16, 1826. Farmer in Laurel County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Laurel County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Laurel County in 1860.
